metadata.synopsis: The player identifies Thulla's tracks to be that of an escaping gnome if they pass a survival check
metadata.how_to_trigger: After spotting the tracks with a successful perception check, the player can interact with any of the clues to trigger the survival check.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Bloodied tracks - quite small, too. A gnome found some trouble here.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: What happened here? It's hard to make any sense of this mess.
